text: Eghtɨ asɨzir nguzir ivariar kam nan damazimɨn zueghan koghtɨ, ia uam a givesegh. Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim an ivezim 10 kinan anetɨghtɨ, ia 12 kina a danɨngigh. Eghtɨ gumazir kam uam asɨzir kam givezeghan koghtɨ, ofa gamir gumazim, gumazir igharazitamɨn anemadaghtɨ, an ofa gamir gumazim dɨborozir ivezimɨn a givesegh.
